document_data.title: The Depths of Airspur
document_data.mainbody:
'''''The Depths of Airspur''''' is an adventure in the [[Living Forgotten Realms]] organized play campaign for [[Dungeons & Dragons]] 4{{th}} edition.

{{Quote|''Kidnappers have taken the daughter of a wealthy noble lord. You are entrusted with the task of saving her before it's too late. A Living Forgotten Realms adventure set in Akanûl for characters levels 4–7.''}}

Index.Creatures: :{{P|[[fire bat]]|11,12-13}} • {{P|[[genasi]]|4-8,10,15-18,21}} ({{P|[[Fire genasi|firesoul genasi]]|5}}, {{P|[[Water genasi|watersoul genasi]]|16}}) • {{P|[[harpy]]|15-18}} • {{P|[[human]]|5,7-8,11,15-18}} • {{P|[[Spitting felldrake|spitting drake]]|5-8}}
Index.Items: :{{P|''[[battleforged armor]]''|16,20}} • {{P|''[[elven boots]]''|6,20}} • {{P|''[[potion of healing]]''|20}} • {{P|''[[shield of defiance]]''|16,20}} • {{P|''[[staff of storms]]''|16,20}} • {{P|''[[symbol of life]]''|6}} • {{P|''[[symbol of power]]''|20}}
